resources.string: This is just a mock plugin that provides fake search results. \nPlease look at the github wiki on how to write your own (working) plugins...
Found teleportr data on your sdcard \nMenu->Refresh to download more..

multi modal mobility browser 
for customized websurfing of sites related to transportation.
